LanguageData.Batteries.label: baterie
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: pasta odżywcza
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: Zbuduj dozowniki pasty odżywczej, które efektywnie produkują znośne posiłki z surowych jadalnych materiałów.
LanguageData.SolarPanels.label: panel słoneczny
LanguageData.SolarPanels.description: Zbuduj panele słoneczne, aby generować prąd.
LanguageData.AirConditioning.label: klimatyzacja
LanguageData.AirConditioning.description: Zbuduj klimatyzatory, aby chłodzić pomieszczenia podczas upałów lub utrzymać odpowiednią temperaturę w spiżarniach.
LanguageData.Autodoors.label: drzwi automatyczne
LanguageData.Autodoors.description: Zbuduj drzwi automatyczne, aby pozwolić na przemieszczania się bez spowalniania.
LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: hydroponika
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Pozwala budować stoły hydroponiczne, na których szybko rosną zbiory niezależnie od terenu i pogody.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.label: electric smelting
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.description: Build electic smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.label: electric cremation
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.description: Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.
LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: colored lights
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.
LanguageData.Machining.label: machining
LanguageData.Machining.description: Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery or disassemble dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.Mortars.label: mortars
LanguageData.Mortars.description: Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.
LanguageData.IEDBomb.label: Explosive IEDs
LanguageData.IEDBomb.description: Allows colonists to build improvised explosive device-based traps from artillery shells.
LanguageData.IEDIncendiary.label: Incendiary IEDs
LanguageData.IEDIncendiary.description: Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from artillery shells.
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.label: microelectronics basics
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench, comms console, and other research projects like tube televisions, and cryptosleep caskets.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: tube television
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: Allows the production of tube televisions.
LanguageData.GunTurrets.label: gun turrets
LanguageData.GunTurrets.description: Allows the production of automated gun turrets.
